title: Forecast Point
description: A single point on a budget-to-outcome curve. Points should be ordered by ascending budget to form a curve showing how delivery metrics scale with spend.

budget.description: Budget amount for this forecast point

metrics.description: Forecasted metric values at this budget level. Keys should be values from the forecastable-metric enum (e.g., impressions, reach, spend). Values are point estimates (numbers). Include spend when the platform predicts it will differ from budget.
